it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Cards

Class PatternCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Cards.PatternCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PatternCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class PatternCard: represents the card in the panel of a player, every card is characterized by a name and a difficulty, and a list of box that represents the 20 box of the card. The pattern could be custom, personalized by the player or a standard one provided from the game. The class is responsible of put the dice in the box, checking the constraint imposed by the rule. The cards are dynamically loaded from file .json, to lets the user of the class add new card in an easy way
    Author:
    adrianomundo
    See Also:
